title: Medicare coverage that understands your needs. Central Health Medicare Plan
description: Sign up for Medicare with Central Health Plan! Find helpful tools to choose the right coverage, doctors, pharmacy, or prescription drug formulary search.
cleaned_text: Central Health Medicare Plan was founded in 2004 by local physicians determined to provide better health solutions to the culturally diverse communities they served. Since then, we continue to provide culturally appropriate, quality healthcare that is affordable to our Medicare members. We are focused on the diverse cultural and unique health care needs of our local communities - our multilingual member care team is available 7 days a week. We offer benefits in addition to what you would receive from Original Medicare like dental, vision, hearing, acupuncture, fitness and OTC - at no cost. All of our plans are designed to offer useful and innovative benefits at little to no cost - so you feel better all the way around. Discover how Central Health Medicare Plan can expand your Original Medicare benefits. Join us at one of our informational meetings to learn about the health care options available to you. Agents are standing by to help answer any questions you may have about our different plan options. Already a member? Please contact * marked fields are required Our business hours are 7 days a week from 8:00am to 8:00pm (PT). Our business hours are 7 days a week from 8:00am to 8:00pm (PT). TTY/TDD: 711 PO
